product_name: IT CosmeticsJe Ne Sais Quoi Hydrating Lip Balm Treatment
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganGive BackExperience intense hydration and the look of your naturally flushed lip color with the IT Cosmetics Je Ne Sais Quoi Hydrating Color Awakening Lip Treatment, your clinically tested, lip-reviving, color-infused breakthrough.
details:
DetailsBenefitsVitality Lip Flush Technology reacts with the warmth of your lips to create a beautiful, customized pop of color that lastsClinically tested hydrationPeptide-infused with essential butters and oils, hyaluronic filling spheres and antioxidants for soft lipsItem 2603951How To UseApply your lip treatment directly to lips for a youthful-looking, natural flush of color that lasts!Ingredients|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---|
| |---| |   | |--------------------------------------------------------| | POLYBUTENE                                             | | HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE                             | | OCTYLDODECANOL                                         | | CERA ALBA / BEESWAX / CIRE DABEILLE                    | | POLYETHYLENE                                           | | TRIHYDROXYSTEARIN                                      | | ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE                                   | | RICINUS COMMUNIS SEED OIL / CASTOR SEED OIL            | | PHENOXYETHANOL                                         | | CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS SEED OIL / SAFFLOWER SEED OIL     | | TRIBEHENIN                                             | | PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE | | TOCOPHERYL ACETATE                                     | | ARGANIA SPINOSA KERNEL OIL                             | | PARFUM / FRAGRANCE                                     | | PRUNUS AVIUM SEED OIL / SWEET CHERRY SEED OIL          | | TOCOPHEROL                                             | | ASCORBYL PALMITATE                                     | | BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII BUTTER / SHEA BUTTER              | | SORBITAN ISOSTEARATE                                   | | ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF EXTRACT                          | | CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT                         | | PUNICA GRANATUM EXTRACT                                | | VITIS VINIFERA SEED EXTRACT / GRAPE SEED EXTRACT       | | CITRIC ACID                                            | | LACTIC ACID                                            | | TIN OXIDE                                              | | SILICA DIMETHYL SILYLATE                               | | PALMITOYL TRIPEPTIDE-1                                 | | PENTYLENE GLYCOL                                       | | BUTYLENE GLYCOL                                        | | SODIUM HYALURONATE                                     | ||

| |---------------------------------------| | [+/- MAY CONTAIN / PEUT CONTENIR | |--------------------------------------------| | CI 77891 / TITANIUM DIOXIDE                | | CI 15850 / RED 7 LAKE                      | | CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / IRON OXIDES | | MICA                                       | | CI 45410 / RED 27                          | | CI 19140 / YELLOW 5 LAKE                   | | CI 45410 / RED 28 LAKE                     | | CI 73360 / RED 30 LAKE                     | |--------| | ] | |   |Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: Nice color for skin tone
reviews.comments: Purchased this based on recommendation from sales person. Like that the color goes on clear but adjusts to your body chemistry. Like the color but wish it would last a bit longer on lips.

reviews.headline: Overpriced Changed Product
reviews.comments: First you increase the price and then added less product. That is bad enough, but the fact that you CHANGED the formula from what it was ORIGINALLY is unacceptable

reviews.headline: Great for daily and nightly use
reviews.comments: I love this balm. I use it for my skincare and even before doing my makeup so I can keep my lips moisturized before applying my lip combo. The only thing I did not like is that I chose the rose one, and I don't think the color suits me (for reference, I am light medium to medium skin toned). That said, it was my fault for choosing the least favorable color. Other than that, I think this is perfect.

reviews.headline: Best tinted lip balm you will ever find!
reviews.comments: Best tinted lip balm you will ever find! Been using it for years. My color is "Love" and its great for every day use or going out. Won't regret buying!

reviews.headline: I use this balm every day!
reviews.comments: Very nourishing. You can wear it with or without an other lipstick/balm.

reviews.headline: overpriced lip balm
reviews.comments: I was disappointed in this product because it is one of those products that color changes into that bright pink color (like those "changes with your skin ph" nonsense and it's just the exact same pink every time) yeah, this is that. It gets two stars because it isn't a BAD product per se, but it is definitely not worth the price. I prefer my burts bees balms. better colors, better nourishment for the lips, and better price. For reference, I bought the Honey shade and it immediately turns into a hot pink on the lips instead of a nice dusty color like the swatch shows.

reviews.headline: The only lip balm that actually works for me
reviews.comments:
This has been the only balm I've used for the last probably decade or so. I wish I was kidding. It was terrible when I couldn't find it in stores. 

I've had probably 2 dozen tubes of it delivered or bought in store, all of the colors at one point or another, but I tend to go to for Perfect Pink since it's the least color and more like a true clear lip balm with a slight tint on me. The others are good for when you want a "my lip color but better" look. I have double lined lips though, so I have to be careful of how I tap my lips together, or it goes too low. Perfect Pink is less visible, so I don't have to be as careful with it. 

Please do not ever get rid of this product. It's the most moisturizing, longest lasting, prettiest balm ever. You can feel that it's on your lips, but in a good way. You know it's there and working. It doesn't instantly dry out like other balms who just want you to use as much product as possible to then buy more. 

This is the one.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: This is one of the only lip balms I've found that actually moisturizes and doesn't make my lips feel gross. It even works in the winter when my lips get super dry. I ordered the darkest color (love?) and it is just enough pigment to give my lips a little color without being too dark or overwhelming.

reviews.headline: Can't ever run out
reviews.comments: I made the mistake of running out of this lip treatment and had to order off of the website at the last minute. It ended up costing me more than it should have and I am so grateful that Ulta stocks this product.

reviews.headline: Love this!!
reviews.comments: IT products are great…been using for years but this is a new item and I love it!  Comes in a few colour options that adapt to your own skin chemistry…I bought honey which looks more brown but on me goes a lovely pinky brown. Feels amazing on the lips, and has a magnetic lid…very cool!!

reviews.headline: Perfect for a natural makeup routine or under a lip combo!
reviews.comments: Instantly, this lip balm was super hydrating and added a perfect, slight pale pink shade that enhanced my skin tone. Would pair perfectly with a lip combo or clear shimmery lip gloss!

reviews.headline: Goes on smoothly
reviews.comments: The color is nice and makes my lips look good and smooth.

reviews.headline: MY FAVE
reviews.comments: i wear this all the time! it is perf for any occasion!

reviews.headline: Happy purchase!
reviews.comments: It is a nice balm and it has a pretty color. I wouldn't put it above any of my others, but it is nice if you want a nice hydrating balm,

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Leaves lips soft and supple. The color lasts for most of the day

reviews.headline: No not buy
reviews.comments: Bought 2 lip balm treatments and both are very dry and not hydrating.  The lip balm used to be my go to. Very disappointed.

reviews.headline: Worth the price
reviews.comments: I was hesitant to spend so mich money on a lip balm but, these are fantastic and long wearing. I want all the colors!!

reviews.headline: So cute and comfy
reviews.comments: I've tried other shades before and love the formula. This shade is perfect for summer, with just the right amount of depth and vibrance.

reviews.headline: love it!
reviews.comments: Beautiful shade.  Very flattering

reviews.headline: probably
reviews.comments: the product I had purchased pre-pandemic as much larger, and price was less. Now, its half the size and more expensive. I dont believe all price increases are justified in anyway other than corporate greed.

media.headline: Made my lips soft and smooth after just minutes
media.caption: Shade love

media.headline: My FAVORITE lip treatment!
media.caption: Nothing better than this lip treatment!

media.headline: Perfectly Perfect in Every Way!!!
media.caption: Je Ne Sais Quoi Lip Treatment Paired With The Gloss! ;)

faceoff_positive.comments: I've been using this lip treatment for several years. It's my go to. I recommend it to everyone because it really does what it says it does. I keep one in my purse and one on my nightstand. It soothes, hydrates, and really gives your lips that natural pop of pink while making them feel and keeping them healthy at the same time!!
faceoff_positive.headline: My FAVORITE lip treatment!

faceoff_negative.comments: It's very rare for me to be dissatisfied with any product from this company. There have only been about three products I found useless in seven years and this is one of them. I wanted this one to work but after months of using it daily I had to admit it wasn't doing what it is supposed to do. For dry chapped lips or as a lipstick primer I've had better results from using Confidence In A Cream, Vitality Lip Flushes, and lip balms from other companies. This has no color or fragrance but that's not why I purchased it. No SPF either. It just doesn't make lips feel great nor does it feel like it absorbs much. The Vitality Lip Flush in the same color is better in my opinion.
faceoff_negative.headline: I hope they make a much better lip treatment.

rollup.name: Je Ne Sais Quoi Hydrating Lip Balm Treatment
